nodes.text: A male servant attended domestic duties at the service of Mother Augwynne Djo, leader of the Singing Mountain Clan, a coven of benevolent Force Witches from the planet Dathomir. Among other things, his tasks included keeping the fires lit and bringing soup to Mother Augwynne's hosts. In 8 ABY, the servant met several heroes of the New Republic—the General Han Solo and his Wookiee copilot Chewbacca, the Ambassador Leia Organa and the protocol droid C-3PO—when Mother Augwynne provided them refuge from the dark side–wielding Nightsisters.
Mother Augwynne Djo's male servant appeared in The Courtship of Princess Leia, a 1994 novel written by Dave Wolverton.
